mapper.select:
select a.id id, a.order_number orderNumber, a.order_date orderDate, a.order_by orderBy,a.status status,a.deliver_date deliverDate, a.deliver_method deliverMethod, a.deliver_number deliverNumber, b.receiver_phone addrPhone,b.receiver_name addrName, b.province province, b.city city, b.county county, b.street street, c.memberID memberIDs, d.doll_code dollCodes, d.quantity quantity, d.doll_name dollName, d.doll_url imgUrl from t_doll_order a LEFT JOIN t_member_addr b ON a.address_id=b.id LEFT JOIN t_member c on a.order_by = c.id LEFT JOIN t_doll_order_item d on d.order_id = a.id where a.status='寄存中'
and b.receiver_phone like concat ('%',#{phone},'%')
and c.memberID = #{memberId}
order by a.modified_date DESC
